title: Can anyone sponsor my blog? - Quora

response.answer_text: What kind of help you need? I am working on a open blogging community and I am the founder of Site Forrest. I can help you with hosting and other technical things for free. I am happy to host your site on my servers free for lifetime Let me know if you need any help with hosting and development of your blog. mail me at soumyadavinci@gmail.com if you need any help
